medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent tension-type headaches with associated fatigue and stress.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms T had her first severe headache at age 4 and has experienced headaches regularly (1-4 times per year) since age 15. The headaches became more frequent over the years, except during 2 years of pregnancy and nursing. Recently, her headaches have been almost daily, often starting upon awakening, on the left side of the head, with a steady, pressing quality that can be severe and disabling. Symptoms have worsened with increased stress at work.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Sinus problems and depression, particularly during menses. History of multiple neurologist consultations and various treatments for headaches. MRI of the head was normal.
medical_history.family_history: A brother who died of a brain tumor.
